OOC: Is Legacy your character? Because I really don't think that people wou=
ld go for having the whole thing revolve around your one character. Also, I=
 really don't think that will solve anything. It'll be the same situation, =
only we'll be in the future...

  From: dew=
boy30816

  Sent: Friday, January 25, 2002 3:=

  Subject: Sequel Suggestions


  I think if we make a sequel it shou=
ld involve Legacy.  You all know my 
  first suggestion, here's my second:
=

  Legacy dumps the poison, but it has a wierd affect on the nitrogen in 
 =
 our atmosphere.  Most of it becomes Latent, but some of it interacts 
  wi=
th our bots sending them into stasis until a decade in the future 
  (our f=
uture 2012 A.D.) so the story of the continent of Atlantis being 
  destroy=
ed in a day and a night was really the story of a couple of 
  bots being p=
ut into stasis lock for a few million years and Plato just 
  left off a co=
uple of zeros because he didn't believe the Earth could 
  be that old when=
 we think a zero got added in making it 10,000 instead 
  of 1000 years.  B=
ut then they wake up in the near future and start 
  slaggin' again.



   =
